description:
cmd/ld: fix some 64-bit issues
A few places in the linker pushed 64-bit values through 32-bit holes,
including in relocation.
Clean them up, and check for a few other overflows as well.
Tests to follow.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3cbb458c93cf ***

cmd/ld: fix some 64-bit issues
A few places in the linker pushed 64-bit values through 32-bit holes,
including in relocation.
Clean them up, and check for a few other overflows as well.
Tests to follow.

R=dsymonds
CC=gobot, golang-dev

subject: code review 9032043: cmd/ld: fix some 64-bit issues
